repo.name: hss
repo.description: An interactive parallel ssh client featuring autocomplete and asynchronous execution.

readme.summary: Well-structured documentation with clear explanations and good installation instructions, but lacks troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No troubleshooting section for common issues like SSH key problems, connection failures, or readline configuration issues

injection_risks.description: The exec_remote_cmd function is called with user input from the readline library without proper validation or sanitization, potentially allowing for command injection attacks.
The system call to mkdir is used with a path constructed from user input (history_path), but it does not seem to be directly exploitable due to the lack of user-controlled input in this context.

critical_findings: Potential command injection vulnerability in exec_remote_cmd function
security.summary: The hss package has some security concerns, including potential command injection vulnerabilities and lack of input validation, but it does not appear to expose sensitive information or have hardcoded secrets.

common_complaints: Host failure handling - commands lock up when one host goes offline
Sudo/elevated privileges issues - tty and askpass problems
Missing feature releases - unreleased changes not in official releases
SSH configuration compatibility - ProxyJump and .bash_profile not working properly
sentiment.summary: The project shows signs of stagnation with slow maintainer responsiveness, critical unresolved issues from 2024, multi-year-old open feature requests, and unreleased changes, indicating a moderately abandoned but still valued tool.

communication.summary: The maintainer responses are clear, helpful, and encouraging.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (2025-10-17)
8 open issues with no activity or resolution
No closed issues in past 6 months indicating lack of maintenance
No merged PRs in past 6 months showing no active development
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release process has stalled
maintenance.summary: The hss package appears abandoned with no maintenance activity for 6 months despite open issues remaining unresolved.

project_metrics.description: An interactive parallel ssh client featuring autocomplete and asynchronous execution.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is generally clear and provides good installation instructions, but lacks sufficient examples and troubleshooting information.
concerns: No merged PRs in the past six months, indicating a lack of active contributions.
Seven open issues with no closed issues in the past six months.
Community: .bash_profile not read over parallel ssh connection
Security: Potential command injection vulnerability in exec_remote_cmd function
High bus factor risk (96% from top contributor)
highlights: Recent commits and releases within the last month.
Two contributors have been active in the past six months.
